reviews.review:
Nach ein paar Stunden Dead by Daylight kann ich sagen, dass es wirklich einer meiner Lieblingsspiele ist. Es ist immer toll mit Freunden zusammen ein paar Runden Generatoren zu reparieren und dann panisch vor dem Killer wegzurennen.
Klar gibt es einige Bugs und Zeugs, bei dem dir echt der Spielspa√ü vergeht (zumindest f√ºr einen kurzen Moment) und auch ein paar Ausraster meiner Seits sind immer mal wieder f√§llig, doch trotzdem finde ich Dead by Daylight einfach ein richtig tolles Spiel, welches trotz des simplen Spielprinzips immer sehr viel Spa√ü macht und eigentlich auch nicht langweilig wird.

Ich mag die Charaktere der Survivor und auch Killer, weil jeder etwas Einzigartiges f√ºr sich hat. 
Ich mag auch die Maps, welche abwechslungsreich und sch√∂n gemacht sind.

Camper-Killer und Anti-Mates sind bl√∂d, ich finde man sollte einfach gescheit spielen, so dass es jedem Spa√ü und Freude macht und jeder was davon hat. Denn es gibt auch gute Killer, welche nicht campen m√ºssen und trotzdem die Runde ohne eine schmachvolle Niederlage verlassen.

8/10 - bin aber s√ºchtig
tr√®s bon jeu qui fait plus stresser que d'autre chose mais tr√®s bonne ambiance !!!

Nach 630 Stunden kann ich mit voller √ºberzeugung sagen, das Spiel ist bei weitem noch niht ausgereift. Aber das macht es besonders. Diese Bugs, die Glitsches.. Es macht das Spiel ungewollt manchmal sehr lustig. Manchmal b√º√üt man daf√ºr auch mit seinem Leben. Aber es ist immer wieder etwas besonderes. In diesem Sinne, danke an die Entwickler <3

MEGER GUT!! 
Ich habe das spiel noch nicht lange aber es ist echt gut und der Doktor ist echt krank. Nur leider keinen zum gemeinsam zocken XD
tHIS GAME IS MY FAVOURITE GAME EVER! YOU GUYS ARE AWESOME!

Ich liebe dieses Spiel.
Ich spiele es von Anfang an und es wird nie langweilig.

When i first started i had about 10 hours on PC. I then moved to xbox when it was release to console. After over 1400 hours on xbox. I switched back to PC and i enjoy the game a lot more. Yes, there are a lot of bug and issues with the game. But, that does not stop me from enjoying the game. I like the thrill of running from the killer and trying to outsmart them. Then picking of the many different iconic killers(leatherface, michael myers, etc.) then you have the killers the devs created. I like that  killer/survivors each have their own 3 perks that do different things to help you in a match.

how do i get the other characters like the rubber mask guy or the weird witch i wanna play as them because i saw jacksepticeye play as the rubber mask guy i wanna unlock him how do get him and/or the others

When I had about 300 hours invested into the game, I encountered a bug with several others in a match that made everyone lose a good chunk of playtime/progress into the game(everyone in the lobby was affected I believe). That made me lose around 200 hours of my progress. I tried contacting support through the steam discussions forum and through email around the time it happened and several months later. The first time they said sorry that they couldn't do anything at the moment and after a long break I decided to get back into the game. About a week ago I found that most of the other people had gotten compensation of bloodpoints for their loss and sent a email with high hopes again that I could get something similar for my troubles. They just end up telling me to make up for my ~200 hours lost progress on a double bloodpoint(exp) weekend. Seriously??? The game is pretty fun, there will be good times followed by bad times, and there is always bugs to be found, one of them being lost progress/corrupted save data.

Today was supposed to be a fun day of playing Dead by Daylight, but between starting almost every game next to the killer, or getting hook camped by most of the killer, my enjoyment of this game has severely soured.

This game is literally awesome!You can play as a survivor or as a killer,your choice.As a survivor 
you have to repair generators and escape the trial.(Heal teammates, unhook them , being chased by the killer,etc)As a killer your goal is to kill atleast 2-3 Survivors and to don't let them escape the trial.I recommend you to buy this game! 10/10!
Plays killer, wins, gets called camper. 13\10 would win again!

Can't recommend this for newer players.
-Perk system is rubbish and favors people with a lot of timesink heavily.
-4 Survivor premade mode is game-breaking for the killer.
-Not immersive at all anymore. Feels like a Tom and Jerry simulator.

This game should be free to play- the WORST matchmaking i've seen in my entire life, the game bugs out often allowing a killer to hit you through doorway, over pallets, around trees ect. Want to play with your friends? well too fucking bad because while a two stack is insta que 3 or 4 is over 10 minutes wait ATLEAST. when a Dev was asked about fixing matchmaking the devs only reply wasy git gud. when there are level 20s going against rank 1 killers... very even very fair. not to mention the game was almost unplayable 3 months ago

terribly optimized. I have a half decent rig and this runs at about 10 fps. Refunded.
When you try to play with randoms you will waste your time... you better play csgo then this crap game

The game as improved massively over time. Lots of bug fixes (still a lot of bugs though...) Frequent updates, new killers. It really keeps the game fresh after all this time. I wish there was a bit more to do though, it can feel a bit stale at times.
Un buen juego pero necesita arreglar bugs.
Great Game, few glitches and is fun to play at night with a headset on as both the killer and the survivor!
Dead by daylight is a good game for starting with horror games it is a very intense game and has many updates whtch gives more killers and maps overall Dead by Daylight is awsome game

EDIT: Un bellissimo gioco.. con una community di mer*a.

EDIT2: Cambio in negativa perch√®,oltre a quanto scritto sopra,negli ultimi mesi il gioco si √® riempito di cheaters (hacks,lag switchers etc..) che hanno trasformato il gioco in un pu**anaio e quando vedi che questi sono VAC bannati e/o con 1000+h di gioco e vengono lasciati in pace capisci che lo staff nonostante le belle chiacchere se ne frega.

Neat concept, but:

- Terrible, terrible netcode. Frequent rubberbanding, dropping of players, etc.
- Very low skill floor for killers, very high for survivors (ie not balanced)
- Game mechanics encourage the killer to camp once you're 'hooked' (ie countdown to bleedout)
- Chase mechanic centers around survivors avoiding the faster killers by using obstacles. But using these too much is an 'exploit' and so a bannable offense.
- Corrupts save files, because apparently this is fine even a year+ after release. Use a friend's save because you don't want to start again from nothing? BANNED!

Could have been an excellent game in better hands, even with all its faults it's kind of addictive, but... just stay away. Best case you have a very buggy experience, worst case you end up with a ban mark permanently on your profile.
Game has become so much more in a year than it was in launch, somethings could have stayed the same, but overall this game just eats your soul, you must play it!

I see a lot of people complaining about bugs and glitches, but the thing is this game is still getting worked on and having patches every once and a while. I personally think this is a wonderful game depending who you are. If you like horror stuff etc then yea you more than likely will like it ,but if your a chill type of person maybe not so much. This game is fun playing with friends and by yourself and there is always something new to happend. Yea, yea the same scenario happends over and over again but it does not come out with the same results. So what say to the people complaining about the bugs and etc should wait a bit until this game gets more settled with everything. Yea it came out about a year ago ,but that doesn't mean it will be all fine and dandy. Now yes back then it had lots and lots of bugs ,but the devs have fixed them and more than likely fixed any others.
